Package me.yleoft.zAPI.utility

Class PluginYAML

java.lang.Object
me.yleoft.zAPI.utility.PluginYAML
public abstract sealed class PluginYAML extends Object
Optimized PluginYAML for managing commands and permissions dynamically. Java 17+ optimized with records, sealed classes, pattern matching, and text blocks.
